lines.text: ...Anyone get the number of that meteorite?
I tasered one of ‘em, and a lady with a fryin’ pan downstairs got the other.
In fact, your little fireworks show accomplished absolutely nothin’.
Well, I guess it bought me enough time to break out of that freeze…
So, you know what, yeah. Sure.
...Ahahaha! Of course I did! I’m Star Seeker!
I can’t give you an inch, can I?
...Uh-huh? Yeah? Right, I’ll be right there.
I’ll be right back. Boys downstairs need me for somethin’.
